name: Escape From Russia: Mobilization
summary: Originally russian runner, in which you have to find yourself in the shoes of a poor piglet, running away from the military commissar with a agenda.

name: Escape From Crimson Manor: Trapped Together
summary: "Escape From Crimson Manor - Trapped Together" is a co-op Escape the room puzzle adventure set in a Victorian manor, where you and a partner must work together to solve challenging puzzles and evade the relentless pursuit of the mansion's sinister owner, Can you uncover the dark secrets and escape?

name: Escape Academy: Escape From the Past
summary:
Visit the Escape Academy of yesteryear in Escape from the Past. This prequel puts players in control of Sandra Solange and Eel Barnes all the way back when they began their journey as students at the Academy!

After a harrowing "accident" at an Academy sporting event nearly results in the death of Headmaster Horatio Windsor, he becomes certain that one of his faculty members is trying to MURDER HIM! Convinced that the murderer has eyes everywhere, he enlists Sandra and Eel as his undercover agents to investigate each of the suspected teachers.

As the "accidents" keep piling up, players must successfully navigate (and survive!) five, all new rooms while piecing together clues to deduce the would-be killer’s identity. It's an Escape Academy whodunnit!

name: Espire 2: Mixed Reality Update
summary: Featuring intense stealth action that takes place in your own home via mixed reality.

name: Escape Simulator VR
summary: Venture into captivating escape rooms solo or in an online co-op with up to 8 players (optimal 2-3). Pick up and examine everything, break objects, solve locks, and decipher puzzles to escape! After finishing the main game, watch for free content updates and explore 3000+ community-made rooms.

name: Escape from the Room with my Kouhai
summary:
Escape from the Room with my Kōhai Game is an escape game based on the Don't Toy With Me, Miss Nagatoro series. The game was made by the original author Nanashi in RPG Maker and released on Pixiv, just one year prior to the mangas official release date.
The game was also translated into English on July 21, 2018.

name: Escape! Skeleton.J
summary:
Here is a little monster.
He likes collecting special goodies from human village.
However, he did not know what disaster his childish hobby would bring about.
Taking the role of the little monster, player will sneak into the village, avoid the villagers, and collect as many "goodies" as possible!

name: Escape Shadow Storm
summary: Escape Shadow Storm is a story-oriented pirate themed set of escape rooms. Each room requires the completion of a bamboozling puzzle to progress. Players will encounter a series of interesting hidden items, hazy riddles, and unpickable locks. Experience the magical story and swashbuckling adventure.

name: Escape the Undertaker
summary: Can The New Day survive the surprises at The Undertaker’s spooky mansion? It’s up to you to decide their fate in this interactive WWE-themed special.

name: Escape from Castle Chezcrea
summary: A linear, challenging level that shows off some some neat ideas I had.

name: Escape From Lighthouse
summary: Escape from Lighthouse of the vast universe. You are in a space prison called "Lighthouse" of space. A human experiment will be conducted. Escape from Lighthouse as you progress through a growing variety of experiments

name: Escape from Slime City
summary:
Escape from Slime City is a short and linear Boom-Compatable singleplayer map set in the titular urban environment of SLIME CITY.

Fight hell's legions as you weave through urban streets and buildings while keeping your feet out of the toxic slime overtaking the city! Can you survive as you make your way back to your car parked on the other side of town? Can you find all of the Doomguy dolls scattered throughout the city?

name: Escape Stories: Virtual Reality
summary: Leveraging the power of virtual reality headsets and controllers, players navigate three themed levels unlocking their path home by solving puzzles that open the way to freedom.

name: Estelaroid: Escape Room
summary: You are in a spaceship, alone. The crew disappeared, and the ship quickly approaches a black hole. In this sci-fi escape room, you must repair your spaceship before being trapped in the universe forever.

name: Escape from the Nursing Home
summary: Dry mouth, arthritis and poor eyesight? That is not surprising, because you're an old man! It doesn't matter how you ended up in the nursing home, it matters how you get out of it!

name: Escape From Exile
summary: Escape From Exile is a Story Driven Survival game you can enjoy with your friends. By following the immersive story and fighting the mobs you find along it. Build bases, farm food and survive the night and maybe you will Escape from Excile!

name: Escape from the Darkness
summary: Your name is Alex Johnes. You're one of scientists caught up in the Black Mesa disaster. After being trained in a special Black Mesa self-defense course three months ago, you're unwilling to accept the sure death as your destiny. You will neither let the troops catch you, nor will they wipe you out. Make your way. Find Gordon Freeman. He is the last hope that drives you traveling on...

name: Esports Heroes
summary: Become a pro esports athlete, scrim to improve, team up with four other players, and reach the top of professional esports. Become a legend in this first-ever idle RPG in the world of pro esports!

name: Escape from Nalaxion
summary: Prepare for an adrenaline-fueled, intergalactic battle like never before in our intense FPS shooter game! As a brave commander leading your platoon on a critical raid on Nalaxion 54, fate takes a thrilling turn when you accidentally stumble upon a hidden trap door.

name: Escape the Dark Tower
summary: Step into a realm of mystery and magic with Escape the Dark Tower, a captivating escape room adventure in charming pixel art.

name: Escape from Russia: Mobilization Madness
summary: You have received a summons to the military enlistment office, and there is only one way out - to run. In Kazakhstan, Upper Lars, try to fly somewhere or look for salvation in grandpa's bunker, the main thing is to have time to run out of the apartment before the public services page loads

name: Essence Child
summary:
Essence Child, solve the puzzle, save your planet!
The sun, which revolves around the planet of the ancients is nearing its last days. The only way to avoid its destruction and keep the planet alive is to find the mystic liquid, celatin. Unfortunately, the celatin is locked deep within a chamber of puzzles. Only you can rescue the planet!

name: Escape Simulator: Portal Escape Chamber
summary:
Explore the detailed environment of the mysterious subdivision of Aperture Science Laboratories!

Solve perplexing new puzzles and devices, in this content packed escape-room!

Working in a laboratory requires the correct gear! Put on your brand new Aperture Science lab coat and start exploring!

name: Escape Basement
summary: You wake up in a dark and damp basement with no memory of who you are or how you got there. You hear moans and groans from behind the locked door. You realize you are not alone. You find a flashlight and a shotgun on the floor. You have to find a way out before the zombies break in and devour you.

name: Escape Room: Mystery Tales
summary: Are you ready to join this mystery adventure journey? Try our new 100-room escape games about kingdom treasure in quest away! The journey is going to be thrilling as there are lots of hidden tasks. Treasure hunt and enjoy adventures in pirates' island games.

name: Escape with AI
summary: Escape from the room with an AI installed. A short escape game using ChatGPT.

name: Escape from the Collector
summary: In "Escape from the Collector", you will be trapped in an old house full of puzzles and secrets. Explore its rooms searching clues that will guide your adventure. Each puzzle solved brings you closer to freedom or dooms you to be trapped in the Collector's sinister game. Will you be able to escape?

name: Escape from Demon Island
summary: In the lost island of Alcatraz, try hard to survive. You can use a variety of weapons and skills to avoid and eliminate wild beasts and monsters, and finally eliminate the abyssal demons and escape. Be careful, monsters are different during the day and at night! Enjoy yourself!

name: Escape Z
summary: Survive the apocalypse with friends in Escape Z. Fight and plan tactics to face hordes of zombies. Choose your character, map and prepare. Survival is your only option.

name: Escapeland
summary: Welcome to the world after the global flood. Join Nikolaj, a man with no past, on his journey through the Valley of Life. Guided by fate, he finds himself caught in the struggle between diverse clans, all vying for power over the remnants of humanity. You have to choose a side in this struggle...

name: Escape Room: Romy Project
summary: Escape Room: Romy Project is a first-person room escape game. Players need to collect clues and solve problems to escape.

name: Escape from the Room of the Sex Dolls
summary: Escape from a room full of puzzles with Aicha, the breast-expanding robot erotic service doll! A new combination of classic escape room gameplay and stunning 3D chest animation. Will you be able to solve all the puzzles and get out of the room safely?

name: Estate Agent Simulator
summary: Estate Agent Simulator lets you enter the exciting world of the real estate market. You can buy, decorate, advertise, rent or sell houses. You can buy vacant land and build houses. Environmental factors will affect the rental prices of houses.

name: Escape Escape
summary: You awaken in a mysterious room and promptly clear items from the desk. The individual behind this watches in surprise on the monitor. "Hey! What are you doing? Let me play my game!" "Escape Escape" is an adventure where you explore, interact, and advance through maps and characters.

name: Escape from Toilets
summary: Escape from Toilets is a coop horror game 1 to 4 players in a session. Go through strange rooms, escape from toilets that want to kill you and other dangers in the form of challenges and puzzles. Realistic graphics, easy controls and creepy atmosphere will immerse you in the game.

name: Esper Girls
summary: Esper Girls is a 2D action platformer game inspired by the many Japanese retro, actiony, and arcadey types of games that populated consoles like the Sega Genesis and Playstation, and a little bit of GBA as well.

name: Espalion
summary: Shooting doujin game.

name: ESPN International Track & Field
summary: The North American port of "International Track & Field 2000". This version contains region-specific changes as well as licensing differences not found in the original European release.

name: Escape Room Bundle Triple Pack
summary:
Three escape rooms developed by mc2games are included!
Between Time, Regular Factory, and Wizardry School.

name: Eseala
summary: As Eseala, you navigate misty cliffs and forgotten pockets of time, uncovering knowledge of the past, present and future.

name: Escapen't
summary: YOU CANNOT ESCAPE - I made sure of that. Solve puzzles, gather clues, don’t crawl into ventilation shafts, and realize how trapped you are in this comedy-horror escape room, my magnum opus.

name: Escape Him.
summary: You're not alone, in this labyrinth of hallways. However, whatever that thing is, it's not human.

name: Escape The Charon
summary: Escape the Charon is a sci-fi adventure meant to be played in one sitting. An ancient alien artifact has been brought to the space station Charon - soon after, the Charon goes dark. James West must search for clues and solve the mystery to discover what went wrong.

name: Escape from the Catacombs
summary: Jakub "KUBA18i" Majewski's first heretic map

name: eSudoku 15K
summary: The ultimate numerical challenge LCD game, play Sudoku on the go.

name: Essence//Structure
summary: Here you'll be thrown into a place named the Structure as an unknown Entity. You are free to roam around and collect Essence, a ressource that you'll need to fly around and move with great agility and speed. Learn more about the Structure by searching memories of the place, and get one of the two endings possibles.

name: ESmart 2.0
summary: ESmart 2.0 (not to be confused with the previously preserved eCDP) was created with the purpose of training pre-existing employees in Japanese McDonald’s restaurants, and thus, these cartridges were never supposed to make it out into the general public.

name: Escape!
summary: A sci-fi based puzzle platform strategy game. Third person action adventure where you need to use your wits and skills to overcome deadly obstacles and complete the goals. Can you Escape?

name: Escape from Death
summary: "Escape from Death" is a 256,000-word interactive horror adventure novel by Tova Näslund. It's entirely text-based—without graphics or sound effects—and fueled by the vast, unstoppable power of your imagination.

name: Escape from the Shadows
summary: Escape from the Shadows is the seventh installment in the Hidden Town series of escape games. Embark on a thrilling point-and-click adventure and solve puzzles and riddles trying to escape from the shadow world.

name: Escape the Glubinka
summary: December 6, 1994. the village of Glubnkovo. You were driving home after a very difficult day along an abandoned village and did not notice a tree peeking out ahead. In an instant, complete darkness overtook you and you passed out...

name: Escape from Actaltraz
summary: Medium sized based map, escape from prison theme.

name: Esferibot
summary: What happened on this automated space station? Take control of Esferibot, the last working robot on the base and try to find it out

name: Escape from Manimal Island
summary: Escape from Manimal island is a relaxed paced linear role playing adventure. This game would appeal to those who want to figure out the puzzle of finding your way off of Manimal island without being chased and or hunted while doing so. It is story driven with easy on the screen instructions!

name: Escape From San Angelos 2
summary: This level takes place in a couple of cityblocks partially destroyed and with heavy earthquake activity.

name: Escape From San Angelos 3
summary: Just like map number 2 this level takes place in a couple of cityblocks and rooftops. Even though the level 2 is more navigation friendly than this one.

name: Escape From San Angelos 4
summary: Unknown to most, the aliens have a secondary reason for being here; our transporter technology. Our system is closing the gap with their system and they don't like it.

name: Escape From San Angelos 5
summary: Having successfully escaped san-angelos, found the transporter to the alien home world ( levels one thru three ), and liberated the clandestine transporter research facility ( level four ), the time has come to deal with the real evil.... the alien sympathizers.

name: Escape
summary: The second in the series (Hijack being the first), 'Escape' takes place in a supposed alien space station, which just happens to have a terran space vehicle parked out back.

name: Eschatology
summary: This is a snake like game with a pixelated style that is very attractive.

name: EscapeMono
summary: Point & click to interact with strange creatures, find items, and solve puzzles in a dark, locked lab. Then just escape...?

name: Escape from the Abandoned Outpost
summary: Escape from the Abandoned Outpost is a hidden object game, where the player's goal is to search the remains of the abandoned outpost and the surface of the hostile planet for resources, allowing them to repair the outpost and get back to civilization.

name: Escape the City
summary: Silva's first map

name: Escape
summary: One short Boom-compatible underground prison map requiring OTEX. Initially intended as MAP01 of a 4-map wad inspired by Unreal (1998) but it didn't end up working out.

name: Escape the Farm
summary: Take on the role of an intrepid chicken to attempt daring escapes from the tyranny of your farmyard masters. Use a variety of tools at your disposal in this 3D puzzle platformer as you run, jump, and flap your way to freedom.

name: Escort's Secrets 18+
summary: Escort's Secrets 18+ is a captivating visual novel that follows the story of Hensel, a complete underachiever and a cheerful adventurer, who possesses an extraordinary talent for charming and doing the opposite.

name: Estate Empire
summary: Estate Empire is a multiplayer strategic game inspired by classic board games. Compete against your friends and develop your own strategy to win, and try to dismantle your friend's empire. Invest in the same street as your friends, use your cards or become the mayor to create new laws against them.

name: Escape from the Nuke
summary: Can you survive the Atomic bomb by traveling through parallel universes through portals as the world is destroyed by nuclear bombs? There are only seconds before the nuclear bombs explode. Can you find the portal doors before the bombs explode in maps and unmarked parallel universes? Since all vehicles have different strategic features, you should choose the vehicle you will use very well. In addition, enemy cars will try to prevent you from passing through the portals by causing you to crash. Also, since portals often change places, you should make a good escape plan every time you start the game. Also, realistic car damage and accident physics have been added to the game.

name: Escape From Flea Market Montgomery
summary: Escape from Sammy Stephens before he catches you and takes you to Flea Market Montgomery which, allegedly, is "just like a mini mall".

name: Escape From The Dreamy
summary:
A horror Slender type game inspired by the Dreamybullxxx memes.

In this experience, you step into the shoes of Steven Sanchez, a dedicated investigator on a mission to unravel the mystery surrounding a missing camper from North Carolina.

name: Escape Party
summary: Embark on 3D online multiplayer escape rooms in Escape Party. Solve puzzles, test your speed, and conquer challenges together.

name: Escape From Boykisser
summary: "Escape From Boykisser" is an immersive first-person psychological horror game that throws you into the sterile spaces of the backrooms.

name: Escape from Castle Claymount
summary: A sinister foe has imprisoned you in a fortress made of clay. Work together with your cellmates to solve the mysteries of this place and Escape From Castle Claymount, the latest escape-the-room game by Colorbomb.

name: Escape Room Mega Bundle
summary:
Five escape rooms developed by mc2games included!
Wizardry School, Palindrome Syndrome, Tested on Humans, Between Time and Regular Factory.

name: Escape the Super Nerdy Dungeon: W100 Master Edition
Escape the Arcade
summary: A casual escape room game for Playdate.

name: Escape from Blackwood
summary: From wanting to go visit a castle to being trapped inside it. Solve the clues and discover how to escape from it

name: Escape Simulator: Among Us
summary: Escape Simulator: Among Us DLC is a free DLC for Escape Simulator, made by Pine Studio in collaboration with Innersloth, based on Innersloth's beloved hit game Among Us. Solve a variety of fresh puzzles and figure out intricate devices that will test the limit of even the wittiest crewmates!

name: Escape Memoirs: Safe House
summary: "Escape Memoirs: Safe House" is a co-operative reverse escape-room puzzle game. You are a burglar who must break into a safe house of a criminal organization to retrieve some sensitive documents. Do you think you have what it takes to overcome the puzzles that stand in your way.

name: Escape from Arcturus
summary:
Escape from Arcturus consist of two distinct action games: During the first part the player has to shoot down torpedoes which are launched from all four directions at the space fortress situated in the middle of the screen.

During the second part, the player has to defend several waves of incoming enemy spacecraft.

name: Escape
summary:
You are trapped in a maze and enemy robots are all over!
Shoot them down with your laser gun, but watch out for their counterattack: They are armed too!
Be careful: Walls are electrified.

name: Escalator
summary:
Escalator is escape room game like The Exit 8.
This is a horror game in which you must find something unusual while riding an escalator and try to escape from an enclosed space.

name: Esports Godfather Origin
summary: Esports Godfather Origin is a Deck-building game simulating MOBA e-sports. You will play a role as team coach and build your team. You need to train players and make strategies in various game versions, beat other teams and finally, take the Champion of the World. Be nobody, or lead your team to dominate!

name: Escape Floor Zero
summary:
Trapped in an infinite parking lot, your only escape is through Floor Zero.
Detect subtle anomalies and make crucial decisions in this mind-bending, psychological horror experience.
Dare to escape the unescapable?
If you see an anomaly... turn back.

name: Escape From The Test
summary: I hate studying, it's too much trouble. If you think so, you might be attacked by "him" too...? Let's escape from the "zero point test" together with the main character!

name: Escape From The Island
summary: story mode and survival mode

name: Escape from Calypso
summary: Immerse yourself in a dark, scary and exciting adventure of exploring an abandoned spaceship. Solve puzzles, look for keys, hide, don't get caught by the strange creatures that roam here. Escape from this ship before it's too late. - Sci-fi - Survival Horror - Metroidvania

name: Escape It!
summary:
Escape It is a homebrew Atari 2600 game developed by Alan W. Smith and released in 2011. The game was later included in the Atari Flashback series of plug-and-play consoles, starting with the Atari Flashback 5 in 2014, and most recently in the Atari Flashback X Deluxe in 2019.

In Escape It, two players must move their squares through a procedurally-generated maze, the layout of which completely regenerates around once per second. The first player to successfully navigate from the bottom-left corner of the screen to the exit at the top-right corner is the winner.

name: Escape PS1 Hagrid
summary: One night Harry tries to sneak out of the dormitory to meet with Dobby in the grounds, unfortunately PS1 Hagrid is patrolling the corridors at night.

name: Escape PS2 Hagrid
summary:
Hagrid makes his return in this mind-breaking sequel to the all-time bestselling piece of software junk "Escape PS1 Hagrid". With over 200 game of the year awards, before the release this game happens to be a more than worthy successor to its predecessor.

Rated with "69/10" by the renowned newspaper "The onion"

name: Escape PS3 Hagrid
summary: A Slender-style parody game featuring Harry Potter characters.

name: Escape from Area 99
summary:
This is the sequel of Half Life: Operation Rosenberg.

While Operation Rosenberg was taking place, Barney Calhoun and Dr. Rosenberg were finding they way out of Area 99 (a hidden and dirty sector of Black Mesa).

Suddenly, they were captured by Black Ops. You will play as Barney and your mission will be to escape from that hideous government facility.

name: Escape Room Pentalogy Bundle
summary:
Five escape rooms developed by mc2games included!
Mystic Academy, Palindrome Syndrome, Tested on Humans, Between Time and Regular Factory.

name: Espionage
summary: Espionage is a 2D narrative puzzle game. The story is set on an alternate history of World War II. You will be a spy deep within enemy lines, facing life-and-death trials and the choice between morality and duty in a series of operations, ultimately growing into a true revolutionary warrior.

name: Escape From Hata
summary: What will happen if a person is overtaken by a global catastrophe during his daily routine? You can find out right now.

name: Esports Manager 2026
summary: Build and lead your own professional esports organization. Scout players, manage contracts, develop talent, hire staff, grow your brand, and compete for championship titles in a deep and realistic management simulation.

name: Escape the Dungeon: The Eye of Tormak
summary: Dive into an immersive dungeon crawler with strategic battles, intricate puzzles, and 100 challenging levels. Collect skills, face fierce monsters, and thwart Tormak's dark ambitions. Will you triumph or succumb to the endless depths?

name: Escortina Life! 2.0

name: Estellina
summary: Just you, the track, and the thrill of the chase

name: Escape From Inferno
summary: Escape From Inferno is a top-down shooter where you play as an angel named Lordrid to escape Hell. There are 10 stages and your goal is to survive the hordes of enemies until there are none left.

name: Escape from Darkness
summary: Escape from Darkness is a single player, first person survival horror game. After waking up alone in a strange, eerie place. You must plunge into the oppressive darkness ignorant of what awaits. Use stealth to avoid danger, but don't play it too safe. You will also need to investigate your surroundings and find resources to fight the horrors that lurk in the gloom around you. Persevere, and make your way out alive in this horrifying experience. Are you brave enough to Escape from the Darkness?

name: Escape the Glitch
summary: Embark on a thrilling adventure within a haunting, fog-laden forest in our latest game. Your mission: collect five scattered bottles hidden in houses across the map, all while avoiding the ominous presence of the glitcher.

name: Escape Game: The Old Folk House

name: Escape From Amexs-137

name: Estab Life: Unity Memories
summary:
Estab Life: Unity Memories is a multiplayer action role-playing video game developed and published by Square Enix that was announced in 2022 as part of a multimedia promotion of the Estab Life manga.

As of March 2024, this game has not been released yet.

name: Escape from Tokat Dungeon
summary: You have to take the keys and go to the exit, avoiding enemies.

name: Escape from Andromeda

Something is wrong with the hospital they brought me to.

name: Escape Island
summary: "Escape Island: An exciting survival adventure! Your mission: Escape from a deserted island full of dangers. Explore, hunt and collect resources to survive. But beware of lurking threats! Use your intelligence and skills to overcome obstacles and escape!"

name: Escape from Darkness
summary: Escape from Darkness is a single player, first person survival horror game. After waking up alone in a strange, eerie place. You must plunge into the oppressive darkness ignorant to what awaits. Survival depends on the use of stealth, finding limited resources, and quick wits.

name: ESC
summary: Experience the art of hacking as you unravel hidden secrets and accomplish intricate objectives. Type your commands to navigate the systems and unveil hidden secrets.

I have visited an abandoned school
However a heavy rain got me stuck in the building……

summary: This level pack includes four new escape rooms set in the world of witches and wizards. Grab your equipment in the magic shop and then go onward to the school of magic, where three classes await your mastery.

name: Escape The Aquarium
summary: This is an exploratory puzzle game Third person operation: The protagonist completes each box court level one by one The satiety that requires constant attention prevents you from slowing down and thinking!

name: Escape the Chambers
summary: Escape ﻿﻿the Chambers its a short mapset for MBF21 that focus on puzzle elements and cryptic progression.

name: Estilhaço
summary: Immerse yourself in a world where technology blurs the boundaries of reality, solve puzzles, or escape from a relentless monster. Are you ready to face the horror lurking in the shadows?

name: Escape From The Island
summary: This is a super fun game.

name: Escape Qinglong Mountain Re
summary: You wake up suddenly and find yourself in a mental hospital, facing numerous severely mentally ill patients, with your life hanging by a thread. Can you escape from here?

name: Escape the Kreegan

summary: A sports zombie fighting game that uses props from different scenes to fight against zombies, completing various level tasks and opening the next level. Each level has different gameplay

Five escape room adventures for you to puzzle through!
Art Heist, Sotano, Vereda, Alumni and Subnet.

Each game offers a unique and challenging experience, Only the most clever and resourceful players will succeed in these thrilling Escape Room challenges.

You are trapped in an abandoned house in the woods.
