You have to find a way out...

name: Escape the Void
summary: Escape the Void is a top-down extraction shooter set in a magical fantasy universe. As a survivor in the void, work solo or in a party with up to 3 other players and uncover the truth about the void. Hunt, loot, craft items and gear, and try your best to survive.

name: Escape The Evil
summary: You're trapped in a dark manor with a killer psychopath. You must escape by solving clues, unlocking doors and completing puzzles. You only have 5 lives!

name: Escape from Baba Yaga
summary: Escape from Baba Yaga is a 2d platformer where you play as Vasilisa the Beautiful, running from Baba Yaga the witch. Along the way, you rescue other children lost in the wilderness. But be careful, if you leave a child behind or are caught with a lost child, the witch will gobble them up!

name: Escape Baba Yaga
summary: In this game players have to work together to escape the evil baba yaga's house. They have to look for the clues and come up with the final code before the witch catches them.

name: Escape Room Collection C2: Psychological Horror
summary: A collection of escape room games with a psychological horror theme. Intensely scary visually stimulated and cleverly psychologically intrigued as players are both timid and captivated, you'll be locked in a room full of horror atmospheres where you must find clues and solve puzzles to escape.

name: Escape Game The Dr. Mouse's Lab
summary:
Who's smarter? Dr.Mouse or you!?
Use items smartly and get out of the lab!!

name: Escape From The Boykisser
summary: Help the "friend" and escape from this place or surrender to the clutches of this monster.

name: Escape From Sunveil Starport
summary: Escape From Sunveil Starport is an MBF21 compatible mini-wad spanning 9 or so maps, initially created during NaNoWadMo2023. This project serves as a prequel to A2Rob's NaNoWadMo 2022 contribution, Machete. Initially, their plan was to ape off level concepts from Knee-Deep in the Dead.

name: Escape the Glitch 2: Backrooms
summary: Embark on a thrilling adventure deep within the eerie Backrooms in our latest game. Your task remains the same: find five elusive bottles hidden throughout the maze-like corridors while dodging the relentless pursuit of the glitcher.

name: Escape Rooms Pack 1
summary:
・Escape from a clean sushi restaurant
・ Escape from the seafood tavern
・Escape from the cosmetics department

name: Escape Academy: Tournament of Puzzles
summary:
Hit the road with Coach Yoach and experience all new arenas, game modes, power-ups, and PUZZLES! Solve your way through giant, replayable arenas filled with secret passages, alternate routes and randomized puzzles.

Journey to Egypt’s Tomb of the First Escapist, the rain soaked and tech-infused Hackannery, or everyone’s favorite Escape theater The Showman’s Studio!

Face off against fellow Escapists in three new competitive modes Escape Race, Tic-Tac-Toe, and Scavenger Hunt, featuring all different mechanics!

And if you thought things couldn’t get wackier, Tournament of Puzzles features exciting new Power-Ups! Deploy distracting traps against your opponents or or gain an advantage by utilizing assists and secure the win.

More of a solo solver? Not a problem! Coach Yoach is happy to let any Escapist puzzle their way through the arenas in single player mode. See how fast you can conquer each course and compete for your best time!

name: Escape from the Cannibal Family
summary: Never get caught! Jack up the doll's vision! Feel their presence!

name: Escape From The Tutorial
summary: "Escape from the Tutorial" is a tactical turn-based RPG. Play as Lazar, a young man aiming to become a hero, starting his adventure in Tutorial, a village that belies its welcoming name. Escape the bitter life, utilize battle strategies, meet unique companions, and unveil the secrets of this world.

name: Escape The Forest
summary: Can you escape the forest? Experience the isolation of being the last person in the dark woods. Uncover the mysteries of your missing neighbors and discover who or what took them from their homes, all while escaping with your life.

name: Escape The Void
summary: Escape The Void First Person is a single-player cooperative horror exploration game. In this game consisting of different levels, your only goal is to survive and find the exit. While doing this, you will need to use your logic, solve puzzles and take each step carefully. You must be alert to the..

name: Escaping DandyLand
summary: Strange, colorful and unusual; Escaping DandyLand is unlike any else preceding in the genre of frustration platformers. Can you traverse the central spire and escape? Can you piece the secret of its true nature together?

name: Escape from Hornhead
summary: Escape from Horn head is 3D horror game. You need to find the keys and potions before he catches up with you. Explore the rooms, look for objects and avoid the pursuer. Try to find the best way, remember the movement of the Horned-headed demon chasing its victim, that is, you.

name: Escape from Somnium
summary: Escape From Somnium is a fan-made AI: THE SOMNIUM FILES x Zero Escape crossover fan game, featuring over 5k words and high-resolution, 4K graphics.

name: Escape Room of Flower
summary: In Escape Room of Flower you are trapped in a deceivingly simple room and need to solve puzzles to escape.

name: Escape Panda
summary:
You are captured in a mysterious room... with a mysterious Panda!
The room is locked up.
Touch arround, Solve puzzles and get out the room...

name: Escape Peng
summary: Can you reach the top of the crevasse?

name: Escape from Ever After: Onboarding
summary: A genre-bending RPG inspired by the classic Paper Mario games! Embark on a quest to battle Ever After Inc, a greedy megacorp from the real world, as they seize control of fairytales for their cheap labor! Escape from Ever After: Onboarding is a prologue ver. of the game Escape from Ever After.

name: Escape And Build
summary: Escape from the enemies and build a fortress to face them, you can play alone or in online games of up to 4 players.

name: Escape Tales: The Awakening
summary: “Escape Tales: The Awakening” is a haunting narrative puzzle game that plunges you into a world shrouded in darkness and mystery. Immerse yourself in a gripping tale of loss, redemption, and the echoes of a forgotten past based on the well-received escape room card game.

name: Escape
summary: A simulator of the handheld of the same name.

name: Espire 1: Sydney Sneakabouts Mission Pack
summary: Deploy Espire Model 1 on 10 thrilling Stealth Action missions in the Sydney Sneakabouts Mission Pack. The Sydney Sneakabouts DLC features 2 sprawling environments and adds 10 new missions to Espire 1's ‘Virtual Challenges' game mode and caters to fans of the stealth or ‘all guns blazing' approaches.

name: Escape From Castle Frankenstein
summary: Escape from Castle Frankenstein is a thrilling platformer game where you play as Frankenstein's monster, a creation desperate to flee the dark halls of Dr. Frankenstein's ominous castle. Will you outsmart Dr. Frankenstein and gain your freedom, or will you be trapped within these walls forever?

name: Escape Room Ultimate Bundle
summary:
Five escape rooms developed by mc2games included!
Mystic Academy, Palindrome Syndrome, Tested on Humans, Between Time and Regular Factory.

name: Escape Simulator: PowerWash DLC
summary: Experience a brand new escape room set in the iconic PowerWash garage! Play solo or in co-op, in VR or flat mode. Solve tricky puzzles, clean away grime for clues, and enjoy new 3D editor props with a rocking new soundtrack.

name: Escaping Wonderland
summary:
Escaping Wonderland is a new chapter in the Down the Rabbit Hole saga, and an all new story from the same developers who brought you the original, Cortopia Studios

Puzzle your way through perplexing challenges and lose yourself in an enchanting landscape where up is down, left is right, and nothing is quite as it seems (except when it is, and even then, it might not be).

Prepare for hours of gameplay, brimming with brain-teasers, enchantment, and just the right dash of delightful nonsense. Will Molly navigate her way out, or will she unearth the curious truth that sometimes the best way out is further in? Step into this whimsical whirlwind and discover what Molly is really escaping from and help her recover her memory—if you dare!

name: Essence of Waluigi II: Eternal Awakening
summary: One year after the events of Essence Of Waluigi, Mario & Luigi are knocked out. While they were sleeping, Waluigi brings back the Essence thanks to the help of a mysterious new partner. Soon, the Mario bros. wake up to find that Toad Town is in ruins. Along with that, a strange looking moon has started to travel towards the planet.

name: Escape From Bunker
summary: A near future in which mankind is threatened by a falling meteorite! And that to save humanity all are placed in bunkers, which are controlled by artificial intelligence! Something went wrong, and even after the danger has passed, the computer still decides that you have to stay locked up here forever...

name: Escape Fear 2: Hide And Seek Horror
summary: Continuation of the horror puzzle game in which the player needs to escape from an abandoned house from a maniac - a real escape simulator is back!

name: Escape from the Tower
summary: Guide your brave princess as she makes her escape from a formidable tower. Battle through hordes of mighty enemies, overcome challenging obstacles, and face off against the fearsome dragon.

name: Escapism Ltd.
summary: This is a pixel-style platformer. Players control Little Blue Hair, who has been tormented by work and finally made up his mind to resign. Using skills such as jumping, dashing, and climbing, he finds a way out and escapes from the maze-like work area.

name: ESports Simulator
summary: ESports Simulator is a simulation game where you can create and manage your own esports team.

name: Escape From The Police
summary: Experience the thrill of high-speed chases in "Escape From The Police"

name: Escape Gaia
summary: you will play as Gaia, the shattered will of a planet, and command your spaceship to explore new worlds, collect and refine various resources, build a home on the damaged spacecraft, summon a wide range of monsters, and ultimately, devour other shattered wills to repair yourself.

name: Esoterica Order
summary: Drop in take on the challenge, in this third person shooter. The odds will be against you and continue to not be in your favor. Good luck Phantom.

name: Escape Gaia: Departure
summary: you will play as Gaia, the shattered will of a planet, and command your spaceship to explore new worlds, collect and refine various resources, build a home on the damaged spacecraft, summon a wide range of monsters, and ultimately, devour other shattered wills to repair yourself.

name: Escape From the Pharaoh's Tomb
summary: Escaping from each challenging room involves solving a puzzle where you’ll aim a magic beam of light to open a magical locked door. You’ll have to contend with dangerous enemies, avoid outlandish traps, and even out-maneuver the chamber walls closing in.

name: Escape From Warehouse
summary: The journalist goes to the warehouse to record a documentary, but becomes a witness to creepy stories. The guards and warehouse workers look very strange. What is really hidden behind the endless shelves and how not to become a victim of the warehouse?

name: Escape Capyland
summary:
An amazing, yet depressing place where your goal is to survive the night! You are stuck in your office till 6 AM, and all you can do is 'keep them away'.

Good luck in your shift!

name: Escape From Lesco
summary: Escape From Lesco is a horror/puzzle adventure, where you must survive through your night shift, navigating through various puzzles and obstacles within the store, in order to find a way to escape...

name: Escape of The Hammer Princess
summary: A retro-styled rampage in both 3D and 2D! After years of waiting to be rescued, the Princess has decided to rescue herself. Escape as the princess in exciting retro-styled 3D, and relive the deaths of her would-be rescuers in classic 8-bit 2D! Bash some Skulls, Break Stuff, and Rise as a Legend!

name: Escape from Bash Street School!
summary:
Join Scotty, Danny, Toots, Sidney, Plug, Freddy, ‘Erbert, Wilfrid and Smiffy on a mission that seems almost impossible; to escape from the most notorious school in the country.

When the Bash Street Kids discover a mysterious old door in the basement of Bash Street School, they just have to explore! But, as they wander deeper and deeper into the maze of tunnels below, they start to think maybe it wasn’t such a good idea.

- Click anywhere on the screen to jump and tap twice to double jump!

- Dodge enemies, avoid spikes, and find the key to help the kids get back to class

- How did you score? Check the report card on the main menu to get your grade!

name: Escape: Backrooms Horror
summary: Find your way through a disorienting maze as reality distorts and fear grips your mind.

name: Escape from Island
summary:
The plane broke down.
Escape from uninhabited island.

name: Escape from Octlien
summary: Escape from spaceship

name: Estranged
summary: Estranged is a 32 level megawad that uses stock Doom & Doom2 textures, with a variety of environments. Levels are playable from pistol start.

name: Escape from the Cursed Convent
summary: Escape from the Cursed Convent is a narrative-driven adventure game set in a medieval girls' convent, offering a rich storytelling experience, and several gameplay styles including QTE, hunting, cooking, and puzzle-solving.

name: Escape Room: Beyond Mystery
summary: Get ready to play a new kind of room escape game developed by Escape Game Studio that specializes in escape games and puzzle games to cater to all the escape game fans. This escape game is packed with all features that a true room escape game player would love to play.

name: Escape From Exit 7 of the Theater
summary: You're stuck in an infinite loop in the theater. You must escape to exit 7 to open the hidden door. Go forward and find the hidden door.

name: Escape From Island
summary: After a helicopter crash on a mysterious island, your mission is to survive and escape before the island's dark forces consume you. Explore, gather resources, and face dangerous enemies as you navigate the island's open world. Can you escape before it's too late?

name: Escape 2: The Closet
summary: In this point and click adventure game, explore every inch of the closet in an attempt to find anything that might help you escape. Every item and every clue will have some kind of use, and it’s up to you to discover just what this use is, and how exactly to go about solving the game’s puzzles in your attempt to escape the closet.

name: Escape 4: The Bathroom
summary: In order to escape the bathroom, you’ll need to figure out a series of point and click puzzles. Then, and only then, will you be able to find you way out of this room. Don’t try to simply leave through the door, either. Those lasers probably hurt.

name: Escape Factory
summary: Escape from the deadliest factories in the world with a party of 4-8 players. Experience multiplayer co-op, physics-based challenges.

name: Escape from Sharptooth Valley
summary:
Escape from Sharptooth Valley is a single-player narrative game to walk, explore, fight, or befriend!

Choose your own story and discover the origins of the Gen-like life in the World of Nefthar.

name: Escape From Castle Orochi
summary:
As the protagonist hired to guard the princess, you must enter Castle Orochi to save the abducted princess. No one has ever returned after entering this mysterious castle.
Solve the puzzles, overcome traps, and defeat all foes to save the princess and escape! Featuring also a high replay value with multiple endings, will you be able to experience each ending?!

name: Es
summary: Es is an action game developed by 9thNight (Arthearts). The game was cancelled in 2007, having released only a Beta of the first two levels.

name: Escape the Ghost House
summary: Oh no! Luigi is trapped inside a ghost house. Can you escape before running out of time in this minigame?

name: Escape from Elm Street
summary:
An interactive flash game based on Nightmare from Elm Street. A must play!
Similar style to Shadowgate on the NES

name: Escaping Darkness
summary: Find your way out of an abandoned mansion, avoiding an evil entity set on hunting you as you escape through pitch black rooms. Scavenge for resources to keep the dark at bay and solve puzzles to move forward. Escaping Darkness is an escape room-based survival horror game designed for VR.

name: Escape Floor 13
summary: Escape Floor 13 is a survival-puzzle game with adventure and simulation elements. Set in a mysterious hotel, players are trapped on the 13th floor and must carefully navigate each level to reach safety. The primary goal is to cross each floor and reach the elevator, but supernatural anomalies complicate the journey. If an anomaly is sensed, players must retreat to their starting point to survive. The game’s tense atmosphere is heightened by the ever-present surveillance of the hotel, challenging players to rely on their instincts to escape.

name: Escape from Mutation Station
summary: A short, unconventional escape room experience. You are the candidate. You must find a way out of this room. Things are not as they seem.

name: Escape Simulator: Mayan DLC
summary: Venture deep into the mysterious Mayan jungle and unlock the secrets of four brand-new escape rooms! Inspired by iconic adventures, this DLC will test your wits and puzzle-solving skills as you explore ancient temples and face legendary challenges.

name: Escape Simulator: The Talos Principle DLC
summary: In this DLC, players will face a series of intricate puzzles and challenges inspired by The Talos Principle universe. Whether you are a veteran of Escape Simulator or a fan of The Talos Principle, we believe this room will offer a unique, engaging experience that bridges the gap between these two beloved puzzle game worlds.

name: Escaping Diddler
summary: Escaping Diddler is a stealth survival game where you escaped the Diddler party, while navigating Diddler's Backyard, Steal bottles of baby oil to escape, but beware—getting caught means game over. Stay hidden, outsmart the Diddler, and escape.

name: Escaping Agent
summary: The AMP mansion has never been crazier in Escaping Agent! Agent00 has lost his precious hats, and he’s gone off the rails. Your mission? Collect them all while avoiding a very angry—and very determined—Agent. Fail, and you’ll be in for quite the surprise. Succeed and you’ll save the day by bringing Agent back to his senses!

name: Escape The Garage
summary: Wake up at an abandoned train station and find yourself in a dark garage. Solve puzzles, find clues, and uncover secrets to escape. With a suspenseful atmosphere and three different endings, this game will captivate you. Can you escape the nightmare?

name: Escape From Castle Matsumoto
summary: Two shinobis race against each other to recover stolen items and escape a Japanese castle, using their wits and tricks to outsmart the opponent. Retro split-screen duel arcade game using pixel art in 3D.

name: Escape Depths of Immanis
summary: Escape the treacherous depths of Immanis, where danger lurks at every turn. Navigate through dark and mysterious caverns, harvest valuable resources, and outsmart relentless enemies as you fight to reach the surface. Will you survive the depths and find your way to freedom?

name: Escape From Sandhill
summary: A horror puzzle adventure begins in the spooky tunnels of Sandhill, which can be played as FPS and TPS. Navigate dark corridors, solve complex puzzles, and survive encounters with vengeful shadows born of sinister experiments. Escape the tunnel and survive the mysteries of the neighborhood.

name: Escape Simulator 2
summary: Sequel to the best-selling escape room game, brings a fresh take on first-person puzzles with a variety of new rooms to explore solo or with friends. Solve intricate puzzles, uncover hidden secrets, or craft your own escape rooms with Room Editor 2.0.

name: Escape Together: Secrets of the Professor
summary: Gather your best problem solving friends or go in alone in this VR Escape Room game, that features both singleplayer and multiplayer with cross platform support. Can you uncover the secrets of the professor and escape?

name: ESP: ExtraSensitive Pervert
summary:
Blessed with powerful extrasensory abilities, a gross girl spends all day arguing with strangers on the internet about anime and eating junk food. Has she finally caught her lucky break when a beautiful girl she's never seen before comes knocking at her door? Find out how this easily excitable pervert handles this unusual development in her otherwise monotonous life.

An erotic kinetic visual novel, ~15k words in length.

name: Escalation Titan
summary: A Canadian U.A.C. base, CFB Titan, is being overrun by demonic forces and you must escape to the transporter on the other side of the large complex.

name: ESHQ
summary:
Unknown government spy must steal secret files from the building called “Evil scientists headquarters”. But his job gonna be a bit more difficult and long...

ESHQ is an abbreviation that means “Evil scientists headquarters”. This is the name for the fake experimental center, used for distraction from the real infrastructure complex:

name: Escape Road 2
summary: Throughout the course of Escape Road 2, players will find themselves in a variety of dangerous circumstances, ranging from urban settings to natural terrains, each of which is packed with its own set of challenges. The user-friendly controls of the game make it simple for players to manage their avatar, enabling them to quickly navigate difficulties, such as jumping over barriers, sliding under obstructions, and running away from threats.

name: Escape Room Killer: Moon, flowers and the Creepy Ghost
summary: Wake up in an abandoned sanatorium with a single mission: escape before time runs out. A killer resides in your mind, provoking you and playing with your sanity.

name: Escape from Nightmare: Horror Tales
summary: A dark and terrifying horror full of secrets and mysteries will make you feel the whole atmosphere of escaping from an abandoned labyrinth.

name: Escape Game The Resort Facility
summary:
The orthodox escape game for you, staged in a resort facility.
Can you solve all the riddles and get out?

name: Escape the Floor
summary: Escape the Floor is a multiplayer (4vs1) horror game where one player takes on the role of the Murant, and the other four players play as Survivors, trying to find lost persone, escape and avoid being caught and killed.

name: Escape From The Core
summary: Welcome on Escape From The Core! Get ready to experience an intense 1 vs 4 multiplayer assymetrical game, where every move could mean the difference between life and death.

name: Escape from Duckov
summary: A single-player top-down looter-shooter game. Loot, escape, build, and eventually become a mighty bird soldier. Beware! If you are knocked down, items in your inventory will be lost! But don't worry. With your infrastructure built nicely, you will rise again soon.

name: Escape from Irene
summary: Escape from Irene is a psychological thriller where you wake up in a mysterious place, with no memory, under the watchful eye of Irene. Explore the house, uncover its secrets, and try to escape without alerting Irene—because if she catches on, something terrible will happen.

name: Escape from Moonbase Alpha
summary: A 3D graphical adventure in which you must find the Doctor and give him ten bags of gold to pay for your transport off of the moonbase. You will not be able to pick up the bags of gold if there is a monster in the room with you. In an emergency, you can take a Hulk pill which doubles your strength for five seconds and allows you to walk through the walls (at a cost of 100 strength units). There are many friendly and unfriendly monsters in the adventure and you will soon learn which ones to fight and which ones to avoid.

name: Escape Room Ultimate Duo
summary:
Two escape rooms developed by mc2games are included!
Pyramids and Aliens: Escape Room and Mystic Academy: Escape Room.

name: Escape from the nightmare
summary: This is an action-adventure game similar to an escape room. During the game, players need to find a key and a door to escape, while also avoiding the pursuit of nightmares.

name: Escape the Tower
summary: Escape the Tower is a horror game where you must escape from a 600-meter-high radio tower within 10 minutes.

name: Escape from the Dungeon
summary: Help Anthony overcome the traps and find the way out of the dungeon before it's too late!

name: Escape Room Six Games Pack
summary:
Six escape rooms developed by mc2games included!
Pyramids and Aliens, Mystic Academy, Palindrome Syndrome, Tested on Humans, Between Time and Regular Factory.

name: Escape Room Ultimate Trilogy
summary:
Three escape rooms developed by mc2games are included!
Pyramids and Aliens, Mystic Academy, Between Time.

name: Escape Game The Painting Mansion
summary:
The orthodox escape game for you, staged in a rumored mansion.
Can you solve all the riddles and get out?

name: Escape the Laser Trap
summary: Step into deadly corridors filled with laser traps, relentless robots, and a terrifying alien humanoid. Dodge lasers, shoot robots, deactivate traps or use them to fight enemies. Explore the maze, find clues and escape.

name: Escape the Quack
summary: Get ready to race in this exciting platformer against the clock, complete your tasks, and outsmart the duck in this captivating low-poly world! Compete against friends and the world with an online leaderboard.

name: Esteem
summary: Esteem is a game that takes you to discover the saga of a little girl called Lais and her internal conflicts as she fights to save her village and her friends. How far would you go for your friends? What fears are you able to face to defend what is most important?

name: Escape Observation
summary: ‘Escape Observation’ is a short walking simulator inspired by the game ‘The Exit 8’, where you can only move your character and control your vision. It is important to note that the game is not about finding out if a room has changed, but rather that each room is different and you must be aware of the signals that these changes give you.

name: Escape Velocity
summary:
a story about a guy in love with an anime character

dedicated to the internet and every kid who grew up pressed up against a tv screen

sound credit: gentle choir of angels by nlux

name: Escape Game: R00m 02
summary: Explore 3D space and escape

name: Escape From Timokha 2: Army
summary: Pay your debt to the Pie Federation or RUN AWAY!

name: Escape From Biochemical
summary: Escape From Biochemical is a 3D single-player puzzle horror game. The protagonist needs to complete various tasks while being chased by the experimental subjects and then escape from there.

name: Escape Game Sleepless
summary: A popular escape game with lots of cute animals. Even if you are not good at solving puzzles, this is an escape game that you can enjoy casually.

name: Escape from Rhetundo Island
summary: Escape from Rhetundo Island follows in the footsteps of its Hapland predecessors, and expounds on the idea by stringing together a sequence of individual screens, or vignettes, through which you must safely navigate the stick-figure protagonist, Johnny Tag.

name: Escape Game The House Under Rain
summary:
The classic escape game for you, staged in the friend's house under the rain.
Can you solve all the riddles and get out?

name: Escape the Arcana
summary: Lost in an enchanted forest, face the Major Arcana in a roguelike deckbuilder journey. Relax, make card combos, navigate shifting paths, and enjoy the groovy jazz. Experiment with different builds and strategies to defeat all 22 Major Arcana and escape.

name: Escape the Boardgame
summary: Navigate through a long series of classic board game-themed puzzles to escape the café.

name: Escape: Zombie Maze
summary: Number19 is sent into a zombie-filled labyrinth through portals by Dimension Technology Lab. In this terrifying world filled with limited ammunition and mysterious enemies, it takes courage and strategy to survive and escape the labyrinth.

name: Escape the Testing Facility
summary: The Facility is a single player, first person escape game with physics and horror elements. Solve a variety of physics based puzzles as you try to escape the facility, while relentless being chased by the experiment gone wrong. All while the timer ticks.

name: Escape From Prison Multiplayer
summary: Escape From Prison Multiplayer is a thrilling multiplayer platformer game where your mission is to make a daring escape from prison! Customize your brave little mouse and race against time to break out. Each room you conquer brings you closer to freedom, but watch out for the dangerous traps and obstacles in your way! Can you outsmart the prison's challenges and make a successful escape? Test your skills and find out if you have what it takes to flee from prison!

name: Esca
summary: Esca is a gripping survival RPG where you play as a repair robot maintaining an underwater research station, facing tough decisions and uncovering secrets of your past.

name: Escape 51
summary: In Escape 51 you play as a small alien that has been mistreated by humans as he works to escape the research facility that has kept him and other aliens like him captive for so long.

name: Escape From Clive
summary: Escape From Clive is a simulated real war evacuation computer game. Successfully evacuating to safety zone is your ultimate goal. Players would go into the Clive and come back with fruitful supplies. Remember that if you are ambushed, you will lose everything.

name: Escape from Haon Island
summary: "Escape from HAON ISLAND" is a first-person 3D platformer with unique controls - where you find yourself on an island with happy inhabitants and try to escape.

name: Escape Team
summary: Turn your living room into an escape room!

name: Escape the Office VR
summary: In Escape the Office VR, you'll navigate through a series of challenging puzzles, cleverly hidden throughout the office, as you attempt to break out of the never-ending work nightmare. Interact with objects, uncover secrets, and outsmart your the boss in this immersive, mind-bending experience.

name: Escape the Room
summary: You come to your senses and you are trapped inside a room that is familiar but something is unfamiliar. You feel like you want to get out of the room but not at the same time. Escape from the room by solving a light puzzle.

name: Espresso Economics
summary: Coffee shop management game that teaches economics. Manage your own coffee shop and make money. During the day you serve orders at your coffee shop, during the night you manage it using economics principles like demand and supply curves, labour market, externalities etc.

name: Esther and the Fallen Star
summary:
Esther is peacefully sleeping when she wakes up with a loud bang and a bright flash. Looking through the window, something very bright can be seen sitting in the garden... what could it be?

Help the little fallen star get back to the sky by making contraptions combining items scattered all around the house.

name: Escape Backrooms: Darkness Horror
summary: Trapped in an endless parking garage. No exits. No light. No escape—only the darkness that follows.

name: Escape Game R00m03
summary: Explore 3D space and escape

name: Escape Game The Nostalgic Cafe
summary:
The classic escape game for you, staged in the nostalgic cafe.
Can you solve all the riddles and get out?

name: Escape from Tung Tung Sahur
summary:
You wake up trapped in a creepy, abandoned village — no lights, no friends, just you... and a whole lot of trouble.
You’ve got one job: save the poor, caged Brainrot animals that the terrifying Tung Tung Sahur has locked up... and get them out safely.
Sounds easy? Oh, sweet summer child.
Tung Tung is always hunting. He knows you're here. He can smell your fear.
And he’s not alone.
- Bombardino Crocodilo patrols the village skies, randomly bombing the map. When you hear him coming, you'd better find cover fast — or you’ll end up extra crispy.
- Bombombini Gusini, Bombardino’s relentless brother, is circling above you at all times. If he spots you, he’ll immediately snitch to Tung Tung, who will come sprinting after you like he just clocked out for lunch.

Each time you play, new Brainrot animals need rescuing. New paths, new panic, new escape strategies. Will you sneak, run, or... cry a little in a corner?

name: Escape the MonStalkers!
summary:
Escape the MonStalkers! is an indie action-adventure horror game.

Look for secret passageways while dodging traps and monsters in dark levels.

The player is sent to recover "Memory Fragments" in order to complete a machine to figure out why he keeps having nightmares.

The game's art style is colorful voxels.

name: Escape From Lava
summary: Rising lava, zombies, and a deadly city... Can you escape? In this **single-player survival game**, your mission is simple: CLIMB UP! Lava is rising every second, and zombies are hunting you down. Reach the top and get to the helicopter to survive!

name: Escape Tung Sahur Backrooms
summary: You heard the knock. Now run.

name: Escape Game R00m04
summary: Explore 3D space and escape

name: EscapeVr
summary: Try to escape a murder room. Interact with objects in the world to find clues. Pick up items that seem to be usefull. Even smashing stuff with a baseball bat could help finding a way out. You allowed to be creativ!

name: Escape the Mansion
summary: Escape the Mansion takes you to a mysterious house on a hill, where confounding puzzles and addictive minigames are coming out of the walls.

name: Escape the Baby Alarm
summary: Escape the Baby Alarm is a cozy puzzle adventure about the chaos and love of early parenthood. Solve hand-drawn, escape room-inspired puzzles inside the baby alarm. Find your way out through mashed peas, pacifiers and sleepless nights. Funny, heartfelt, and beautifully illustrated

name: Escape Toon Kingdom
summary: Escape From Toon Kingdom is a 1–4 player co-op horror game. Play as mascots trapped in a dying theme park. Explore. Solve. Suffer. Every attraction holds a secret—and a piece of your escape.

name: Escape From Vampire Castle: Miss Luna's Diary
summary: This game is an escape game about survival from vampires. Hide in the shadows to avoid being found by the vampires and search for effective items in the mansion. To survive, find the items you need to escape.

name: Escape Game The Empty School
summary:
An orthodox escape game set in a school building after school.
Solve the riddles in the school and try to escape.

name: E-Snake
summary:
A phone classic, brought to the E-Reader!

E-Snake contains many levels, modes, secrets and its own achievements!

name: Es Un Día Normal y Eso Es Casi Milagroso
summary: Mom has been at the dentist for too long, so Little Girl and Boy go looking for her.

name: Escape Roomble
summary: Sabotage, Set traps, Sneak through secret passages and lie to avoid expulsion, while up to other 3-11 players try to collaborate to solve the Escape Room challenges in this first person, multiplayer online, coop, Social Deduction game set in a procedurally generated Pyramid.

name: Escape from Helltowers
summary: escape the evil research facility Helltowers with your life.

name: Escalating Duel
summary:
Escalating Duel is local-multiplayer 1v1 2D-Arena-Shooter with deck-building elements.
After each round the contestants add a card to their deck of upgrades. As the match goes on the madness escalates as the decks get thicker.

name: Escape From Benjamin's Room
summary: Crack challenging puzzles to escape the room and recover Benjamin's memories.

name: Escape Velocity
summary:
Blow your way out of a collapsing bomb factory!

In Escape Velocity, you play an alien ant named Gerund as they navigate the ruins of their former workplace. Using a prototype demolition tool known as the Starter, break rubble, launch objects, prime cannons, and fling yourself to safety!

name: Escape Academy 2: Back 2 School
summary: Class is (back) in session with Escape Academy 2: Back 2 School! Play in solo or co-op and explore an all-new campus, escape life-threatening puzzle rooms, and unravel a conspiracy as old as the school itself — all before the bell rings.

name: Escape Dash Journey
summary:
Get ready for a thrilling adventure in Escape Dash Journey! In this action-packed platformer, you’ll run, jump, and dash your way through challenging levels filled with traps, obstacles, and exciting surprises.

With intuitive controls, stylish visuals, and creative level design, Escape Dash Journey delivers a fun and addictive experience for players of all ages.

name: Esc4pe!
summary: ESC4PE! is a 1-4 player action-thriller, horror and survival game. Navigate deadly traps, solve the codes, and escape through maps with unique themes. But be careful… the creature’s hungry, and you might just be dinner. CHOMP!

name: Escape Everlit
summary: A narrative-driven sci-fi mystery featuring four playable protagonists trapped in an island mansion. Switch between characters to explore, investigate, and piece together their mysterious past while uncovering the truth behind their predicament.

name: ESA Shield
summary: Join the European Space Agency's S.H.I.E.L.D. mission and discover why aliens aren't the biggest threat to us! In this science-based Earth defense simulator, you fight real cosmic hazards. Build, Monitor, Protect! Become Earth's Last Defense.

name: Escape the Desert
summary: So you're stuck in a middle of a desert with a single flask of water... how do you escape? Do you stare at the sun long enough for it to stare at you back? Well, that might not be the worst idea. Try it out in Escape the Desert, a strand-type roguelike strategy game!

name: Escape From Kiss
summary: You awaken to find yourself in a bizarre village. ﻿An obsessive suitor is pursuing you, desperate to claim a kiss! ﻿You must determine if every hut in the village is completely identical to the first one in order to obtain the key to escape. ﻿Only one chance awaits!

name: Escape From Chancellor's Chambers
summary: A magical escape room experience that tests your skill with magic spells and puzzle solving! Do you have what it takes to get out of the Chancellor's Chambers?

name: Espirito Delusion
summary: Embark on an adventure to explore the corrupted school, solve puzzles, and battles evil monsters in turn-based combat with the power of FAITH.

name: Escape Memoirs: Bank Heist
summary: "Escape Memoirs: Bank Heist" is a co-operative reverse escape-room puzzle game. You are a member of a burglar gang which is planning on pulling off a bank heist. Do you think you have what it takes to overcome the puzzles that stand in your way?

name: Escape
summary: Trapped in a haunted house with something lurking in the shadows, you must escape before it's too late. Solve puzzles, stay silent, and survive the terror. You only have five days… or you'll never leave.

name: EscapeTheBrainrots
summary: A chaotic local co-op horror game where you and your friends must survive bizarre creatures, answer twisted questions, and outsmart the Brainrots.

name: Escape Game:The Kitty The Vacant Lot
summary:
A puzzle-solving and escape game set in a nostalgic vacant lot where you used to play as a child!
Solve the riddles in the vacant lot and try to escape.

name: Escape to Moscow 2
summary: This is a visual novel - a continuation of the game Escape to Moscow. More than 3 hours of gameplay, 6 game days. Immerse yourself in new adventures in Moscow and other locations. You need to help Aliya escape to freedom again! The plot of the game depends on the decisions you make.

name: Escape the School
summary: Trapped in a repressive campus ruled by a brutal principal, you must survive a terrifying night and uncover buried truths. Escape the School is a student-made horror game blending suspenseful gameplay with sharp social commentary.

name: Espina
summary: Enter Rose, a brave young rebel battling her way through a deadly sci-fi megastructure in search of her missing sister. Dive into fast-paced, thug-filled hack-and-slash action, explore a bold, clichéd world, and embark on a rebellion fuelled by mystery, momentum, and emotion.

name: Escape Lanky Kong
summary: You woke up in the backrooms after clipping through the ground and now Lanky Kong is chasing after you for some reason. You have to collect 8 Donkey Kong merchandise to win. This is yet another backrooms game. It only took me 2-3 days to make this.

name: Escape from Grustovia
summary: The long-awaited draft notice has arrived, and besides the window, you have only one way out - to RUN. The main thing is to get out of the apartment before the draft notice page fully loads.

name: Esports Team Manager
summary: An esports team management simulation game based on MOBA game management by The Brain Trust. Sign players, keep them happy, and strategize to win it all.

name: Escape Game:The Odd Crime Scene
summary: An orthodox escape game set in a crime scene! Solve the riddles and try to escape from this strange crime scene.

name: ESG Football
summary: Co-founded by two professional gamers, ESG Football is the first ever online multiplayer 11v11 and 7v7 American football video game for PlayStation 5, Xbox Series X, and PC.

name: Escape House
summary: 'Escape House' is a short (around 30 minutes), walking simulator game wherein the player is paid to partake in an experimental, real-world video game which is currently in development and not yet accessible to the public. Will you partake, and at what cost?

name: EscapeSimulator
summary: Control a worn-out wooden chair that is tied up to the victim Q. The E, A, and D keys respectively accurately lift specific chair legs, and the left and right keys drive rotation and swinging forward. When using one leg as the axis, the nerves need to be tightened to maintain balance.

name: Escape From Spikes
summary: Collect the Gems. Take the key and open the door. Watch out for Spikes while doing so.

name: Escape Protocol
summary: Escape Protocol is a multiplayer indie horror game in which you must maintain the abandoned facility of Necrova Industries, while avoiding what lurks beneath the surface.

name: Escape the Backrooms Bodycam
summary: See what the bodycam saw. Survive what it didn’t.

name: Escape30DayCircle
summary: A first person perspective horror game for finding anomalies. This realistic style of 'Escape from 30 Day Cycle' may be suitable for you. You will play the role of a stay at home man. One day, the player is trapped by a mysterious force and needs to explore secrets and find ways to escape

name: Escape From Amazonia
summary: This game is a survival horror, where the protagonist must escape from the place where he finds himself, with only the plane to save him. Search for resources, turn on equipment, drive vehicles. If it doesn't work, try again with a different strategy. Escape the Amazon!

name: Escape Game R00m 05
summary: Explore 3D space and escape

name: Escape the Humans
summary: A quirky 2D puzzle-platformer where you're a squishy alien on the run from humans. Outsmart traps, solve puzzles, and sneak your way to freedom. Game Mechanic: - Level Progression - Puzzle Solving - Environmental Puzzle Step into a relaxing, futuristic experience on your invaded planet. (EN only)

name: Escape from the Tomb of Apep
summary: Explore an ancient tomb, solve some puzzles, maybe find a secret room and find your way out.

name: Escape the Beach
summary: A surreal first-person narrative experience. Walk along an endless tropical beach, encounter out-of-place artifacts and look for a way to escape while being guided by a soothing yet sarcastic voice who makes you ponder the meaning of your existence.

name: Escape Protocol : Online
summary: In this co-op horror game, escape an unknown realm where reality is shattered and dimensions collide. Solve puzzles, avoid deadly entities, and uncover the hidden saboteur.

name: Escape of the School
summary: Explore an abandoned Brazilian school, escape from the murderous teacher, and uncover the secrets behind a massacre that happened 20 years ago in this first-person horror filled with cultural references. Survive, hide, and escape.

name: Escape Simulator: Spy
summary: Take on four spy-themed escape rooms. Train at HQ, gear up, infiltrate a villain’s yacht, and sabotage a rocket launch. Includes new rooms, outfits, and a cinematic soundtrack. Your mission is to escape!

name: Escape the Maze
summary: Escape the Maze is an action, adventure, and horror game that you can play with up to 3 friends. While searching for escape routes together and trying to reach the final level, you will experience a truly immersive gameplay thanks to in-game voice chat.

name: Escape From Russia
summary: This is an adventure horror game, the action of which takes place an alternative reality, in which it is necessary to help Alexei Marginalny to collect an American passport without getting caught by Vladimir Vladimirovich Vrutin and escape from an unprecedented Russia.

name: Escape From Covid
summary: Escape from Covid is a fun and exciting platformer. Guide your character through a contaminated world in which you have to escape the virus. Fight challenging bosses.

name: Essential Power
summary: Essential Power is a short visual novel. The main character's mundane routine is turned upside down when he meets Mia, a talented designer.

name: Escape Protocol: Hospital
summary: A text-based escape room horror with multiple endings. Trapped in an abandoned hospital, use classic text-adventure commands to explore, solve puzzles, and uncover sinister secrets. Will you find your way out?

name: Escape Game: Galleria
summary: Escape from Here!

name: Escape from Irene: Parasite
summary: In Escape from Irene: Parasite, a psychological horror prequel, you play as an examiner in Duskwood. Investigate sickness, anomalies, and strange events as you search for the truth behind Irene.

name: Escape the Maze
summary: Escape The Maze is a single-player escape game set in a mysterious maze. Solve intricate puzzles to find the only way out. With an engaging storyline, challenging puzzles, and a suspenseful atmosphere, it offers a unique gaming experience as you navigate your escape as a test subject.

name: Escape: Mall
summary: Wake up in a closed mall and you are alone.. or maybe not? With no way out but going down, you must descend using elevator through each floor.

name: Escape the Cradle
summary: Escape the Cradle is an Incremental RPG with cute pixel art about a foxgirl trying to clear out the dungeon she was born in so she can leave with her mother and explore the outside world. She's animated with Live2d and you restore her hp between runs with headpats!

name: Escape From Hadrian's Wall
summary: As a prisoner in the fortress of Hadrian’s Wall, liberation is in your grasp as you unravel mysteries buried in the depths. In this immersive VR puzzle adventure, explore the Roman keep, claim your mystical apprenticeship, and immerse yourself in a tale that forever changes the course of history.

name: Eseal: Reject, Reclaim, Redeem
summary: In ESEAL: Reject, Reclaim, Redeem join an elite team sent into a compromised facility to erase a catastrophic mistake. Battle nightmarish horrors, follow ruthless orders and uncover dark secrets. Will you obey your superiors or defy them? Survival and morality collide in this tense co-op FPS.

name: Escape Game The Edo Period
summary:
A classic escape game set in the Edo period!
Solve the mysteries and aim to escape from the Edo period.

name: Escape game R00m06
summary: Explore 3D space and escape

name: Esc/ape
summary: Esc/ape is a first-person, physics-based combat game starring Abe, a genetically enhanced ape. Slide, ground pound, and throw your way through brutal trials to prove you’re the apex specimen and finally break free from the lab that caged you.

name: ESMO: Esports Manager Online
summary: Build your dream Esports team and face other teams worldwide in multiplayer

name: Espectro the Fighters Focus
summary: Espectro - The Fighter's Focus is a beat 'em up action game with retro visuals and exuberant pixel art. Espectro and his allies, Sayuri and Iron Crusher, face hordes of enemies and powerful bosses in their quest for justice.

name: Escape from Mental Hospital
summary: Embrace this 100 doors challenge, seek and find hidden objects and solve escape puzzles, in order to help her piece together fragments of her past. But with sinister forces determined to keep her trapped within the asylum’s walls, she must use her newfound knowledge in this adventure escape game and employ special abilities to escape 100 mental hospital doors before it’s too late. “Escape the mental hospital,” she repeats to herself, determined to break free.

name: Escape If You Can
summary: Lost in a silent maze of bookshelves, you have only your wits to escape. Solve the puzzles before the labyrinth consumes you.

name: Escape The School
summary: Embark on a mission to the school complex with a flashlight, wander the dark alleys and run from the school staff.

name: Escape Velocity
summary: Dash through futuristic buildings, grab their cores, and escape before destruction in this fast-paced speedrun adventure full of momentum, robots, and chaotic obstacles.

name: Escape from Tarkov: PVE Zone
summary: Unlock co-op PvE mode for Escape from Tarkov — play with friends, progress without wipes, and develop your character at your own pace.

name: Escape From Ruin: Greymart Simulator
summary: A post-apocalyptic loot-fight-extract survival game with escape-style raids by day and black-market shop management by night. Fans of Tarkov-like gameplay — and players who love running management sims — will feel right at home.

name: Escape From Cluckov
summary: Escape from Cluckov is a PVE cooperative looter shooter—in a chicken's world! Loot your foes, build your arsenal, and upgrade your character in the world of Cluckov. End the fowl Duck regime and show them you don't give a cluck.

name: Estella
summary: A 3D rhythm game for mouse & keyboard. Ride a golden comet through the cosmos and compose your own adventure with every song and every note.

name: Escape the Script
summary: They say you’re a monster who destroyed five star systems. Now you’re trapped in a futuristic prison, facing warped puzzles, absurd therapy, and ethical trials — all to prove you’re still human. Good luck surviving your psychological evaluation!

name: Escape Alice House
summary: Point and Click escape room inspired by Alice in Wonderlands

name: Escape Alice House 2
summary: a point and click inspired by alice in wonderlands

name: Escape Game R00m07
summary: Explore 3D space and escape

name: Escape 9 to 5
summary: A hardcore climbing parkour game that challenges you to break free from the monotony of office life. Start in the office cubicles and ascend toward the limitless skies above. As you climb higher the final heights will test not just your skill, but your patience too.

name: Estória
summary: An epic 2D coming of age adventure story, similar in style to Sierra and LucasArts classics like "King's Quest." Use items to solve puzzles, talk to characters, and unravel the mystery threatening the Kingdom of Estória. *iPhone / iPad version available on the App Store.

name: Escape From Hell
summary: In Escape From Hell, navigate through a series of eerie rooms, each unveiling pieces of a tormented soul's past. Solve intricate puzzles to uncover hidden sins and decide their fate. Beware, not all spirits welcome judgment. Can you piece together the truth and escape?

name: Escape From The Island
summary: Escape From The Island is a 2D, pixel-art survival game in which, as a castaway on a dangerous, uninhabited island, you collect supplies, build a shelter and fight for survival while discovering the secrets of this island.

name: Escape The Labyrinth
summary: You found yourself inside a labyrinth in the night where some creatures are hunting you down, luckily you brought some stones with you, they do not seem to be useful against these monsters but you could use them to orient yourself while you try to get out the labyrinth.

name: Escape the Void
summary: Escape the Void is a first-person platformer game—a test of nerve, patience and muscle memory where the world itself is the puzzle. Platforms will rotate, move, or disappear entirely. Gravity will be your enemy, and the very path you once walked might be in your way once again.

name: Escape
summary: A small-scale, lightweight platformer, solo-dev game. You need to open locked doors by collecting ID cards, and then escape this strange place.

name: Eskadrila X: Rift Protocol
summary: Eskadrila X - Rift Protocol is our modern take on classic arcade shooters — fast, intense, and built for pure fun. You’ll pilot a high-speed recon ship through alien swarms in fully 3D environments, switching between dynamic chase and top-down views for the perfect mix of nostalgia and action.

name: Escape game R00m08
summary: Explore 3D space and escape

name: Estranged Family
summary: Estranged Family is a spin-off story of Friendship Test. In it, you will yourself on a mysterious planet​ with a found family that has been through many hardships. The family lands must learn how to begin their new lives here, but there is only one problem: you have no idea what's going on, how you got here or how you're supposed to feel. Help the main character, Star, figure out their role in this family, make choices that might improve your relationship with them or maybe completely disappoint them.

name: Escape from Tarkov: Bear- Senezh
summary: A winter combat outfit designed for BEAR operators operating in harsh weather conditions. The Senezh set combines practical insulation with a subdued military aesthetic, providing a reliable look for cold-weather operations.

name: Escape from Tarkov: Usec - Gold Squadron
summary: A winter tactical outfit for USEC operatives, inspired by modern special forces aesthetics and adapted for cold environments. Available exclusively for the USEC faction.

name: Eschaton: Battle for Eternity
summary: Eschaton is a vivid, fast-paced top-down arcade sci-fi space shooter with weapon upgrades, intense boss fights, dynamic SFX, and an original metal-meets-synth soundtrack. Chase high scores, accuracy ranks, and speedrun times while killing aliens in this chapter of a longer legendary saga.

name: Eschalism
summary: Survival horror game set in a dystopian Indonesia, where the V.O.K. regime has maintained a stranglehold on the nation. As Sane, a Paramita's officer, investigates a cosmic worshipping cult, navigates a non-euclidian world, and fights against monstrous creatures.

name: Escape game R00m 09
summary: Explore 3D space and escape

name: Escape from the Black Monolith
summary: ESCAPE FROM THE BLACK MONOLITH is a short but tough fast-paced shooter that lets you GUN your way down the face of a SKYSCRAPER. Unlock several weapons, dodge enemies peeking through windows, and shoot down flying threats! Initially made by a solo developer for a game jam, then enhanced for Steam.

name: Escape Game The Museum of Memories
summary: A classic escape game set in an art museum hosting an exhibition of past works!
